name: Dream of a Crystal Clear Rio Pinheiros
description: Located in Sao Paulo – Brazil, Rio Pinheiros is a is a tributary of the Tiete River that runs in a good portion of the main roads of the city. Full of pollution issues, there’s still a lot of hope and investments going on for it’s depollution and return of wildlife. This Artwork enlightens its importance for the city and the utopic dream for a future crystal clear lake.
